newsitem.title: USA: Pakhoed to exit U.S. deepwell disposal.
newsitem.headline: Pakhoed to exit U.S. deepwell disposal.

text.p: Pakhoed Corp said it had decided to exit the third party commercial deepwell disposal segment of its waste management business.

The company said its subsidiary, Empak Inc, will assist in the transfer of its deepwell disposal customers to GNI Group Inc's waste management subsidiary, Disposal Systems Inc. Under terms of the arrangement, EMPAK and Disposal Systems will cooperate with each other for a smooth transition.
GNI said it expects the arrangement will be immediately additive to revenues, earnings and earnings per share.
The Koninklijke Pakhoed NV subsidiary said "Empak will concentrate its disposal focus on waste water treatment along with its railcar cleaning segment.
